website_summaries.verdict: These first-rate slip-on sneakers are wonderful options for kids who enjoy outdoor activities.
pros: Sneakers are machine-washable for added convenience
Sold in a broad array of vibrant colors
Breathable sneakers can be worn comfortably with or without socks
cons: Insoles tend to come out of the sneakers on their own

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and soft
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 pairs of new shoes for our son recently. 2 from the mall and this one on Amazon. Every time we went out, he would only pick this one. We compared them and realized this one was the softest. Sometimes he did not wear socks but his feet did not stink. Thanks for the breathable material. Overall it's cheap but good.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put on / take off
customer_reviews.text: Wear these for bike riding all summer. Super easy to put on / take off. Very airy and cool on the feet. Size 3 in kids is equal to size 5 in women's. I am an adult with small feet so I buy this size. I have pedaled with these every day about 10 miles daily all summer. I love them. They don't show any wear at all yet. Just some dirt. Love them. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when they were on sale but I'd recommend even at full price. My son is 3 and he loves to slip these on. He went hiking in them and we hiked through hills, slippery ground, and water and they worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Light and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping my son could wear them now, but these were HUGE when they arrived. He won't be able to wear them until next summer, is my guess. Still, they are cute and well made for the cost. Very breathable material and easy to get on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I think my kid would have liked these but we were sent two different sized shoes. Sent them back and kept the other pair we ordered. They are bright though so if you have a little kid you won’t lose them on the playground in these!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey J.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps up with my elementary age child and her favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these shoes. This is our second pair. We hope you make bigger sizes as these are perfect, breathable shoes. She wears them all spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Easy for a 4 yr old to get on and off by herself and very breathable in the Florida heat. The only thing is the insoles come out every time she takes them off so that's a little pesky.
customer_reviews.author: Larlar818

customer_reviews.title: These are great quick on the go shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great quick on the go shoes. My kid can easily put on themselves. Definitely wont last too long, but they are reasonable priced, light, and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy.. Material looks cheaply made if you look up close. But for a kid with growing feet, this is good enough
customer_reviews.author: vasaq

customer_reviews.title: Our 7 yo loved the color and fit
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 yo loved the color and fit. Seemingly smell resistant. When they get wet they take a while to dry so wouldn't recommend as water shoes. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Lecklider
